column4: please, will someone assist me in my disk space calculation problems, nautilus says i have 13 gb free but all other diskapps say i have 32 gb free
hmm...what other diskapps say more than that then?
the drive is 220gb, totla file size onthe drive is 167gb
don't forget you might have more than one partition (/dev/sda1, sda2...) and you might be comparing one partition (sda1) 's space with the full disk space
gparted reads 195.6gb total and 172 gb used and 23.3gbfree, df -h reads 190gb and 170gbused with 14 gb free
I actually see a difference in a few Gb too between them
what could be causing this difference
